title: Halo_2_Activation_fix.zip
description:
NO instructions needed.


Place .dll files in the directory of the folder name.


Simply put the "mf.dll" thats in the "SYSTEM32-folder" into your windows/system32-folder.



Put the "MF.dll" thats in the "halo2-folder" into your halo 2 folder


3. Play and enjoy HALO 2 WORRY FREE!!!


This is the fixed version it now works with windows 7 beta 1 

and Xp,Vista 



And please, 100 percent feedback!!!



UPDATE!!::::

if you get any error with the 'MFPLAT.dll' just delete it, 
IT is just the beginning of the start up of the game, IE: 'Microsoft games Studios'

or whatever.
